      • addRecord

        public java.lang.Boolean addRecord(java.lang.String strTable,
                                   java.lang.String strKeyName,
                                   java.lang.String strKeyContents)
        The addRecord method checks to see if a specific record already exists in the database and if it doesn't, it adds it. If the record already exists, it just skips over all of the code
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        strTable - - the table
        strKeyName - - the key name
        strKeyContents - - the key contents of the key field
        Returns:
        - true or fail;
